reviews.review: 10 zambies out of 10 would kill again.
Just awesome.

Отличная игра, много мяса на частных серверах, шесть игроков, по началу возможно бегать по одному, но на последних волнах придется кооперироваться. Игра скиловая большое количество сложностей, постоянно расширяется, недавно добавлены новые карты. Графика минимальна, но ориентированна она на любителей КС Квак Анрил, так что им не привыкать, высокая динамика, хоть и хоррор ничего страшного там нет. Сравнивать с Left 4 Dead не корректно, лефт игра классом выше, кооперация лучше, режим сражения уникальный (его взяли за основу в игру Natural Selection), килинг проще, больше игроков типа я один всех замочу, правда только до сложности самоубийство чего уж говорить о сложности АД, но не значит хуже, они не конкуренты, разные. Любителям поделать ачивки на 100% ее хватит надолго. Саундтрек можно добавить в избранное тому у кого там уже лежат треки Unreal T. В общем игра поддерживается, выходят паки всякй мелочи, один забег по карте обходится в 40 минут, так что рекомендую купить тем кто ценит время и прежде всего игру с людьми против AI.

i'll tell ya that you will find there is nothing not to like about this game.  its a perfect balance of zombie killing mayhem, and competitive fast paced fps gameplay.  it is very challenging and has great co-op elements.  its my favorite game of all time next to the years of dedicated counter strike, quake, and unreal tournament style head hunting.  this game features a solid engine.. the graphics are stunning!  slightly dated, but immense artwork and detail makes that easy to overlook.  i mean really great textures with unique level design and feel.  there is a favorite map and character class for everyone!  its actually very fun leveling character classes and trying to get all of the available trophies.  if you're looking for a game that will continue to satisfy unlike the less than 1-2 year stint the new COD's have to to offer at a fraction of the cost then this game is for you.  it actually has a gaming community with complete admin control over all the game servers?  very well balanced overall gameplay, and extreme strategy components i can't emphasize enough will cease your heart and soul.  i recommend this game to all shooter/zombie enthusiasts.  best teamplay game i have ever played!  please do yourself a favor and buy this very affordable gem, and learn its greatness deserves more attention than the current run-of-the-mill mainstream FPS releases.  you won't be disappointed!!

в общем рекомендую любиелям кровавых командных замесов против компь.терных противников)) будет весело)
So much raw freakin FUN!!!!!

Killing floor the grittier, hardcore and depressing version of Left4Dead.
Without zombies (they're not zombies, they're mutants).
Oh, and english military. (BLIMEY MATE). This uh...can get old fast, but funny for foreigners to hear.
and arenas instead of linear maps...and leveling system...and rounds...
In fact, it's not the same at all.

This game isn't for everyone, 
you'll get that the second you load the menu,
 see the headache inducing graphics and ominous music, 
you'll be feeling the game killing you slowly inside. (in a...good way?)
It's all intentional, the apocolyptic atmosphere, fighting desperately for your life against odds that get more impossible every round.

 It's draining, the maps are dark, run down, abandoned hell holes, and your only companions are your team mates, who will abandon you without a second though (rightly so too, you'll do the same).
Oh, I best mention, TEAM MATES. It's a multiplayer only game, ignore the single player, you don't want to go there, find lobbies with people in them that seem like they'll stick around, the more the better.

It brings people together, forces you to rely on allies, you're stuck in hell with them.
There are epic times to be had, especially with slow motion cam, and last second kills.

The skills in the game do little, with a grind curve that becomes tedious after a few levels. Only the most hardcore players sinking months of their time are going to get past certain levels, we're talking 10,000 headshots etc to gain small bonuses.
They serve badly as motivation to keep playing.

And yet I do play this game still, years from the release, after buying many better games since, I come back and play it for a few hours, not often, but from time to time, every few months, whenever I'm in the right mood. 
It fills a satisfying niche in my game library.

I recommend you pick this up, because even though you'll grow tired of it, you'll end up wanting to play it again. How many games can claim to have the longevity of this?

Killing Floor, the name says it all. Wave after wave of carnage. If you've played LFD or LFD2 then you have an idea as to what you're facing here. Zombies are more than just that. You've got your basic melees, you've got wall crawlers and stealthers, not to mention bloaters with acidic vomit, Pounders that act like tanks and beat the crap out of you. Don't forget the Husks which set you on fire with their attached fire laucnher weapons and finally. When you finish every single wave you get met by the Patriarch; the biggest bad ass of em all. He stealths, he has a Rocket Launcher, Mini Gun AND his augmentations allow growths in his body to snap out like a Xenomorph and rip your head clean off in a single hit. 

Start racking up those kills, level those classes and stock up on Ammo, Grenades, Guns and Body Armor. You're gonna need it.

Jogão! Na minha opinião ele é um jogo bem simples e tem um gráfico bem fraco, e ao mesmo tempo é um jogo desafiador e divertido, que na certa necessita de trabalho em equipe, o que é muito divertido jogar com os amigos!! 
 Ele me lembra um pouco o L4D2: tem monstros com habilidades diferentes, precisa do trabalho em equipe, tem uma boa variedade de armas de fogo e armas brancas, a grande diferença, eu  acho que é Killing Floor trata-se de resistir, o L4D2 tem que atravessar de uma safe para outra.
 Enfim, recomendo pra quem gosta de matar monstros, jogar com os amigos e etc. Killing Floor é aquele tipo de jogo que é tão fantástico que os outros aspectos viram apenas um detalhe.

Killing Floor is a load of fun with good friends.

Killing Floor é um jogo que deve ter presença garantida na sua biblioteca de jogos. Diferente de Left 4 Dead, que tem todo um enredo a ser seguido, Killing Floor foca no esquema de jogo em rodadas com até 6 jogadores simultâneos: Antes de criar o jogo você pode alterar a duração e a dificuldade da partida, e para principiantes, começar no Medium pode gerar uma certa decepção. Apesar de simples, o jogo tem uma boa dificuldade. Mate todos os zumbis que surgirem para encerrar sua rodada e corra para a loja para recarregar sua munição, reparar o seu colete e voltar a mais uma rodada - uma verdadeira corrida contra o relógio. Ao final de todas as rodadas, surge o Boss. Derrote-o e logo após outro jogo começa em um mapa diferente. Mais simples, mais rápido, porém não menos divertido. Além do modo multiplayer, você pode se divertir e treinar jogando sozinho, no modo "Solo".

Você também pode escolher jogar com diversos personagens e diversas classes diferentes, com limitações diferentes (exemplo: Sharpshooters usam pistolas e alguns tipos de rifles, mas não podem usar metralhadoras). Quanto mais você jogar com uma determinada classe, mais experiência você ganha e aumenta seu nível, ganhando assim melhorias. 

A versão Windows também vai com uma SDK para você mesmo criar mapas e mods para o jogo, além de contar com mais de 170 conquistas e várias DLCs, que não são mais do mesmo pro jogo. Conseguem mudar drasticamente o "enredo" e lhe dar mais tipos de jogo, com mais personagens, armas, mapas e conquistas (com o Bundle completo, o número de conquistas chega a 275!), mas a versão simples do jogo pode lhe atender perfeitamente bem, apesar de suas limitações. A jogabilidade é simples, os comandos são precisos e as teclas utilizadas não fogem muito do que já estamos acostumados a jogar. Uma boa jogada dos desenvolvedores foi remover a clássica mira que fica no centro da tela e lhe ajuda (e muito) na hora de jogar, exigindo mais habilidade do jogador. No início pode ser desconfortável, mas logo a falta dela se torna imperceptível. Outra maravilha do game é a trilha sonora regada a Heavy Metal, com guitarras pesadas e gritantes, que trazem mais emoção durante o game, e ao fim da rodada em busca da loja de armas, uma música calma e serena, apropriada pra situação.

Com certeza deixei vários detalhes para trás, mas experimente jogá-lo um pouco. Você vai entender porquê ele DEVE estar na sua biblioteca.

Каждый матч Killing Floor - это набор миллионов различных ситуаций, к которым вы окажетесь не готовы. Невовремя перезарядились, и монстр измолол ваш труп своими шипастыми лапами? Кинули гранату, а она отскочила вам под ноги? Пропустили подкравшегося сзади самого хилого упыря, и он схватил вас, позволив орде уродов окружить вас со всех сторон и сожрать? Пожалели патрон в самом мощном дробовике, и теперь ваше безжизненное тело пожирают обезумевшие твари? Вы каждый раз говорите: "ОК, я учту свои ошибки, и в следующий раз я убью их всех!". Но затем вас настигают совершенно новые неудачи, и вы понимаете: недостаточно учиться на своих ошибках, недостаточно хорошо стрелять, недостаточно изучить все локации вдоль и поперёк. Чтобы выжить в отчаянной схватке, нужно быть таким же сумасшедшим, как и этот кровожадный, наступающий со всех сторон биомусор.

Игровые локации наполнены ходами, тупиками и местами, откуда лезут полчища мутантов. Опытный игрок уже знает позиции, где легче всего обороняться... но "легче" - не значит "легко". И совсем не значит "безопасно". Также можно "устраивать" точки обороны, заваривая сварочным аппаратом дверь за своей спиной, это снижает опасность нападения сзади, но надолго кровожадных мутантов это не сдержит - рано или поздно дверь слетит с петель.

В уродливрй и депрессивной местности вы сражаетесь с отвратительными "упырями", всё это действует на нервы, угнетает, злит. Но не это ли нам с вами нужно иногда? Врубить бесящую игру, поотстреливать головы мерзким вражинам, пока они не отгрызут голову вам самому, и таким образом спустить пар... Эту функцию игра выполняет отлично.

This game is amazing. (period) There is nothing that I can find wrong with this game. If you haven't played it at all then picture Left 4 Dead 2's campaign feel mixed with Call of Duty Black Ops Zombies wave survival gameplay. I picked up the game awhile ago for $3 with my friend and it is by far my favorite zombie game. (Yes, I have played the Left 4 Dead series, Dead Island series, COD Zombies series, and the Dead Rising series too. I have played many other zombie games but these are the most well known) This game is the most fun with atleast one other friend but it is still extrememly fun without a friend for the community is great and you can easily find another friend online. I have seen this game go on sale multiple times and they were all under $5 but if it is not on sale at the time you are reading this then you should still pick it up because it is totally worth it. I hope that this was helpful. :)

A variety of maps and guns as well! Would definitely recommend to to a friend or to anyone who likes this type of game.

It is zombie killing at its finest. A simple game where you and your group are sent in by the government to eliminate the zombies. With a simple leveling system, great weapons, and classic English banter between compatriots, you'll find Killing Floor an enjoyable passtime for you and your mates.

So spare some dosh and get this game!

Killing Floor is the type of game you have to play with an open mindset. What I mean by this, you have to play to kill or be killed. The simplest mistake can make a match turn badly. This game will keep you on your toes and test your reaction abilities. This game is extremely fun when played with family or friends and can provide endless hours of entertainment. I highly recommend Killing Floor and it has the traditional roots of the old school fps games we've all grown to love.

Хорошая игра, про зомби или зараженные мутанты... ну что-то типо этого. Игра сразу можно заметить что не с самым лучшим как сейчас стало говорить "Графоном", но это совсем не мешает игре привлечь многих геймеров. Хоть я и не сильно слежу за графикой, но здесь она совершенно не мешает, а если поставить на самых высоких, то вообще отлично выглядит, сочетая такую тему, которую использовала КоД в Black Ops и в World War. Мы убиваем монстров или мутантов, которые приходят в волнах, а когда побеждаешь всех на волне, есть промежутки между ними, чтобы хорошо скупиться, и снова пуститься в бой. 
Мне лично все понравилось, и графика вполне не плохая, геймплей вполне удобный, есть еще плюс, когда ты делаешь критические удары, то происходит замедление кадра, чтобы более эпично прочувствовать момент убийства.
Но помимо всего этого есть и минус, который нверное многое портит... это то, что в игре хоть и есть мультиплеер и можно поиграть с друзьями, но очень уж трудно к кому, то присоедениться. Для меня это вообще был ад... мы с другом все пытались поиграть вместе. Мы пытались где-то час, и потом мы бросили эту затею... Сказать честно может я просто чего-то не знал как это сделать, но скажу сразу, всем кто хочет поиграть в эту игру с друзьями, вы должны иметь железные нервы, чтобы вытерпеть все, что это будет крайне не легко.
Так что моя оценка игре вот такая:
7 из 10
